sec_data.business_description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories. The company also provides various services including Apple Music, Apple TV+, Apple Arcade, Apple News+, iCloud, Apple Pay, and AppleCare. Its products and services are sold worldwide through its retail stores, online stores, and direct sales force, as well as through third-party cellular network carriers, wholesalers, retailers, and value-added resellers.
sec_data.registered_business_address: One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, California 95014
